item.description:
THE IRON LADY

(PG-13)
Friday, April 13 @ 7:30

(UK, 2011) Directed by Phyllida Lloyd. Screenplay by Abi Morgan. Cast: Meryl Streep, Jim Broadbent, Olivia Colman, Roger Allam.   105 min.
Only an actress as gifted as Meryl Streep could bring something new to our understanding of a politician that anyone who lived through the 1980s already either adores or reviles. Her tour-de-force, Academy Award®-winning performance as Britain’s first woman Prime Minister takes us on unexpected journeys - as a daughter of a grocer becomes the leader of the male-dominated Tories, and as a tough political mastermind turns into an aging recluse who is losing her ability to reason. The ever-surprising Jim Broadbent (Life is Sweet, Moulin Rouge, Gangs of New York) is pitch perfect as Thatcher’s husband Denis. “Streep’s performance is so true and so uncannily accurate, so full and so complete in its understanding, that she is fascinating every second she is onscreen.” Mick LaSalle, San Francisco Chronicle.


http://www.weinsteinco.com/sites/iron-lady
item.how_to_find_us: I wear a tan jacket, and I knit.
